items.title: Super Mario Bros. desktop metal display reward now available to redeem for Switch Online members
items.summary:
Nintendo has been rolling out new Super Mario Bros. metal displays, and just weeks after the Super Mario Bros. 2 version, a fresh Super Mario Bros. unit has now arrived. This piece, much like the other two we saw recently, is a Nintendo Switch Online exclusive, and it’s now up for grabs at the My Nintendo Store. We expect this one to go out quickly as it appears to be available in limited quantity, so get in now if you want one after getting more details below.

more…

items.title: Save $180 on Hoverfly’s starter-friendly H3 16-inch folding e-bike with four FREE accessories at a new $400 low (Reg. $580)
items.summary:
Amazon is offering a new low price on an already budget-friendly EV bundle, with the Hoverfly H3 16-inch Folding e-bike coming with four add-on accessories at $399.99 shipped in its white colorway while the other colorways are sitting at higher rates. This package has been going for $580 at full price these days, which we saw drop lowest to $406 back in late July, but that rate is now getting out here today. You’re looking at a 31% markdown that cuts $180 off the tag for the best new price we have tracked – and don’t forget you’ll be getting a rear cargo basket, front carrier bag, a phone holder, and a rearview mirror too.

items.summary: The Ultraloq Bolt NFC smart lock is receiving a free upgrade that enables near-field communication (NFC) tap-to-unlock with compatible Android phones. The model currently supports Apple’s Home Key, which lets you tap-to-unlock with an iPhone. The update makes it one of the first locks to offer the functionality across both iOS and Android, without requiring […]

items.title: Anker’s SOLIX Fan Fest weekend flash sale drops new F3000 power station back to $1,599 Prime Day low (Reg. $2,599), more
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing SOLIX Fan Fest Sale running through September 21, Anker has launched a weekend flash sale that is bringing the costs down on four different units. Among them, we spotted Anker’s new SOLIX F3000 Portable Power Station with a FREE 120V generator input adapter dropping down to $1,599 shipped, which beats out Amazon’s pricing by $51, and sadly, the extra 5% savings code isn’t valid for these deals. It was already brought down from its $2,599 full price to $1,649 in the sale, with the flash savings here returning it to this rate for the first time since it appeared during July’s Prime Day event. You’re looking at the second-ever chance to pick it up at the best price we have tracked – plus, you’re getting the free adapter cable that is valued at $99 normally, which only sweetens the pot. Head below to see the full lineup of flash deals while they last.

items.summary:
Amazon is now offering the best price yet on the LEGO Technic BMW M 1000 RR Motorcycle for $198 shipped. This model usually fetches $250 at full price, which is what you can expect to pay picking it up directly from LEGO, where discounts are very rare occurrences. Discounts at Amazon are equally rare finds, and the last time we saw one was 2023 when the kit had $10 cut from the tag. Today’s deal is coming in bigger-than-ever, with $52 off the going rate for the best price we have tracked. Head below to learn more about it and the other LEGO Technic sets seeing discounts right now.

Intel was supposed to have ended the production of its 14nm processes years ago, but apparently, that doesn’t appear to be the case. Without so much as a prompt, the chipmaker quietly introduced a new CPU called Core i5-110, which is basically manufactured under said process. As a quick primer, the Core 100 series includes […]

items.title: Spotify finally launches Lossless streaming. But besides me, who else cares?

items.title: Pre-order deals: AirPods Pro 3 and Apple Watch Series 11/Ultra 3 now live [Update #2]
items.summary:
Apple has now officially unleashed its next-generation iPhone 17 lineup, Apple Watch Series 11, Apple Watch SE3, Apple Watch Ultra 3, and the new AirPods Pro 3. All of this joins a host of new accessories and is now up for pre-order (iPhone 17 pre-sales go live on Friday though). While you can of course pre-order all of the new gear straight from Apple, it is also all now live on Amazon, and if you have some FREE store credit on your account from all of the promotional offers we have featured over the last several months – there were hundreds in Amazon credit promotions live for Prime Day this year – you can now leverage it on the new Apple gear.

items.title: Nintendo Direct goes live today – one of the biggest and longest ever
items.summary:
Nintendo Direct goes live this morning, and it’s going to be a big one folks. Nintendo has not been tight about livestream events in this the year of its new next-generation console, from three major dedicated showcases for its biggest new Switch 2 game releases, as well as an IndieWorld and a Partner Showcase that perhaps seemed worse then they were just because Silksong wasn’t in them. But Silksong has released, and we already have all the details and a release date on the new Kirby Air Riders – today’s show is going to be one of the biggest Nintendo Direct livestreams ever and the first proper showing since Switch 2 barely had a chance to touch down on store shelves before we all scooped them up.  

more…

items.title: EcoFlow’s parallel Outdoor Sale gears you up for adventures in nature with up to 62% discounts starting from $90
items.summary:
Running alongside its Home Backup/Hurricane Preparedness Sale, EcoFlow also has a separate Outdoor Sale running through September 14 with up to 62% discounts on power stations, power banks, and bundles tailored for adventures in nature, complete with bonus savings. Among the lineup, we spotted EcoFlow’s DELTA 2 Max Portable Power Station bundled with an 800W alternator charger at $1,139.05 shipped, after using the code 25EFDCAFF at checkout for a bonus 5% off, which beats out Amazon’s pricing by $760. This bundle fetches $2,498 at full price direct from the brand, though it can usually be found for $1,899 at Amazon. Discounts over the year have dropped costs as low as $1,049, with those two deals both happening in July. The deal we’re seeing here is a combined $1,359 markdown off the MSRP, which lands it at the second-lowest price we have tracked. Head below for more on this combo and the others that are perfect companions for fall adventures and more.

more…

items.summary:
KALIYADI Polarized Sport Sunglasses (3-pack)

Buy for $11 (Reg. $22)

What we love

Opt for the modern take of sport sunglasses with today’s notable markdown. For $11, you’re getting not one, not two, but three pairs. Quick math will tell you that you’re spending just north of $3.50 each on these. I like that there are a variety of colors that include blue, gray, and red.
